msbt.message: Sometimes it's nice to take a break from working out at home to go work out by someone else's, .
You visit this island often? It's super nice here. I feel like I could jog for days,
This place has all the comforts of home, Except my free weights, my cases of sports drinks, and my tub of protein powder But I could fix that!
Sometimes it's nice to take a break from working out at home to go work out by someone else's, .
You visit this island often? It's super nice here. I feel like I could jog for days,
This place has all the comforts of home, Except my free weights, my cases of sports drinks, and my tub of protein powder But I could fix that!
There's just something about tent life that gets me pumped up for strength training, .So pumped, in fact, that I almost ripped a hole in my tent earlier
The best part of travel is seeing all the awesome biceps. The world's full of great arms, !
This place gets me SO PUMPED. I think I've jogged about miles since I got here, !
Every protein shake I've had here has been more delicious than the last, .Who knew had mega flavor powers? Wow!
There's just no substitute for doing sit-ups on an island way out in the middle of the ocean, .You should try it sometime!
Do you live here? Awesome to meet you. I'm .I just got here today, and I gotta say this island's really nice! Feels perfect for , .
Yo! How's it going? They call me Mega-Arm .Erthe "Mega-Arm" thing is actually what I call me. But I really am all about arm day, !Anyway, thanks for hosting me. This place is awesome!

Heya! You live here? My friends call me , .I'm on a quest to find a new rival. My last one flexed so hard they got stuck like that. It was awesome!Hmm? That look in your eye I think you might have what it takes. Let me know if you need a rival!
Yo! Big thanks for the invite! I got here as quick as my legs could jog me, .
Hey! Thanks for the invite. I'm super pumped to be here, !
I just got back from a short -mile jog when your invite showed up. Thanks, !
What's up!I got invited here by, uhsomeone. Really wish I could remember their name so I could thank 'em!
Yo! How's it going, ?Someone invited me here for a big lifting competition. Can't wait. I've been bench-pressing buses all week!
Hey there! How are you?I am SO pumped to be here. As soon as I got the invite, I hopped on my kayak and rowed over, !
Not everyone's cool with staying in a tent, but I don't mind, .As long as I've got enough space for push-ups and crunches, I'm set.
I'm on a quest to take my fitness to next level. By the time I'm done, I want my biceps to have biceps.And why should I stop at a six-pack? There's LOTS of numbers higher than six, !
I figured if I was gonna test my limits, I'd need to get away from the comforts of home, .Except I didn't know I'd end up homesick for a row machine
Not everyone's cool with staying in a tent, but I don't mind, .As long as I've got enough space for push-ups and crunches, I'm set.
I'm on a quest to take my fitness to next level. By the time I'm done, I want my biceps to have biceps.And why should I stop at a six-pack? There's LOTS of numbers higher than six, !
I figured if I was gonna test my limits, I'd need to get away from the comforts of home, .Except I didn't know I'd end up homesick for a row machine
If I'm gonna be living in a tent, I want to make sure it's not gonna fall over.My tent stakes are dug deep into the bedrock below the island. It's not goin' ANYWHERE, !
Ever gone somewhere and the air just tastesbetter?I hope nobody minds me breathing up all their air. It's just so delicious, !
There are so many awesome jogging routes here that I can't decide where I wanna live, .There's a route by the store, one on the beach, one by the airport where I can race planes I just can't pick!
I gotta say, I am PUMPED to conquer the scene, .Uh DOES have scene, right?
As soon as I move here, I'm gonna start lifting EVERYTHING. My place? Lifting it. Yours? Lifting it too.Resident Services? Better believe I'm gonna lift it. My arms are gonna be epic, !
I've got awesome news. You're about to get a new workout buddy! Yep, we're gonna be neighbors! scouted me for 's squad, !I can't wait to get started! Bring. It. On!
So, uhI think I'm moving here. came by, and I was staring at those hypnotic triceps, and then, umYeah. I have NO idea what happened next. I just have this muscular urge to live here now, .
You on the market for a new spotter? 'Cause you're getting one! We're gonna be neighbors, !'s asked me to join 'em on a quest for ripped-er arms. How could I say no?
Almost forgot to tell you—you're getting a new island workout rival. Me, !How should we compete , , and triathlon!
Hey, guess what? We're gonna be neighbors! And by neighbors, I mean sworn workout buddies.So you better get set to be swole, ripped, mighty, built, brawny, and buff all at once, !
Oh yeah! I've been meaning to tell you—I'm gonna be moving here soon, .I had a revelation on mile of my noon jog. Moving here just seemed right. So did a lot of things, really

This island feels just about perfect for interval training.Once I start, it's hard to stop. Um I mean that it's really hard to stop- start-stop. Wait, hang onAlright! What I'm TRYING to say here is that once I start, it's hard to stop doing intervals, .
You could just move here.
I'm still confused.
This place is great, but do you know what'd make it GREATER?! A super- muscular rival, .There's nothing like having a rival. They make every breath sweeter and every bench press heavier. Ahhh
Move here! Be my rival!
Sounds exhausting.
Have you ever tried on the beach here, ?It's like the PERFECT training ground for it. If I lived here, I'd be star in no time!
Move here and be a star!
It's just a beach...

OK! So interval training is when you start working out super hard, then go slow for a bit, then go strong again.I didn't do a good job explaining that before Oh well, !Anyway, I just hope someone appreciates this place like I do. The workouts here are intense!
Yeah, but being exhausted because your rival pushed you beyond your limits feels soAWESOME!Oh well. My quest to find the world's best rival continues, !
Yeahyou're right. I got too excited. Thanks for talking some sense into me, .I really gotta start thinking more with my head muscle and less with my muscle-muscles
Wow! I can't believe I got my mighty hands on genuine merchandise, .It must be awesome to be around so much buff talent. I'm jealous!
Move here and find out!
It's alright.
I just can't believe someone made something for me. This means a lot.I really wanna pay 'em back, but I don't have anything, .
You will if you move here!
Don't worry about it.
I'm just stunned that someone on would make something for meDoes anyone on need a fitness coach, ?
Sure do! Move on in!
Not really.
I just know I could never, ever make anything this cool OK! I'm gonna go home and train up, ! Someday I'll be back, and I'm gonna bring the strongest gifts anyone's ever seen!
Yeah, but Are you sure? I mean this was a seriously, incredibly, ultra- muscular gesture, .Wellalright. I won't forget this!
Hmm Well, with delts like yours, I guess I shouldn't be surprised.Alright! I'll remember this, and also your awesome delts, .
